solution_line_template: Wade's points is {num_games} x {wade_avg_points} = <<{num_games}*{wade_avg_points}={wade_total_points}>>{wade_total_points} after 5 games.
His teammates' points is {teammates_avg_points} x {num_games} = <<{teammates_avg_points}*{num_games}={teammates_total_points}>>{teammates_total_points} after 5 games.
So, the total score of the whole team is {wade_total_points} + {teammates_total_points} = <<{wade_total_points}+{teammates_total_points}={total_team_points}>>{total_team_points} after five games.
